languages.text: Самая пугающая ситуация на корабле — в арсенале. Часть искаженных команд, несмотря на усилия на мостике, смогла пробиться в отсек, и обычные техноматы покорно их исполнили — подняв температуру в хранилище боеприпасов! Термометр вот-вот достигнет критической отметки, и снаряды взорвутся, разнеся арсенал и прилегающие к нему отсеки.

traits.locale_text: Из-за искаженных команд с мостика матросы подняли температуру в хранилище боеприпасов. Термометр вот-вот достигнет критической отметки, и боеголовки взорвутся, разнеся арсенал и прилегающие к нему отсеки.

languages.text: Currently, the most frightening situation on the ship is in the arsenal. Some of the distorted commands, despite the bridge's best efforts, still made it into the compartment, and the lower-ranking technomats complied — by raising the temperature inside the ordnance depot! The heat is about to hit critical levels, and the shells are going to explode, blowing the arsenal and the neighbouring compartments to smithereens.
languages.original_text: Самая пугающая ситуация на корабле — в арсенале. Часть искаженных команд, несмотря на усилия на мостике, смогла пробиться в отсек, и обычные техноматы покорно их исполнили — подняв температуру в хранилище боеприпасов! Термометр вот-вот достигнет критической отметки, и снаряды взорвутся, разнеся арсенал и прилегающие к нему отсеки.

traits.locale_text: Currently, the most frightening situation on the ship is at the arsenal. Some of the distorted commands, despite the bridge's best efforts, still made it into the module, and the simple technomats complied — by raising the temperature inside the ordnance depot! The heat is about to hit critical levels, and the shots are going to explode, blowing the arsenal and the neighboring modules to smithereens.

Currently, the most frightening situation on the ship is at the arsenal. Some of the distorted commands, despite the bridge's best efforts, still made it into the module, and the simple technomats complied — by raising the temperature inside the ordnance depot! The heat is about to hit critical levels, and the shots are going to explode, blowing the arsenal and the neighboring modules to smithereens.

Some of the distorted commands, despite the bridge's best efforts, still made it into the module, and the lower-ranking technomats complied — by raising the temperature inside the ordnance depot! The heat is about to hit critical levels, and the shells are going to explode, blowing the arsenal and the neighbouring modules to smithereens.

Currently, the most frightening situation on the ship is in the arsenal. Some of the distorted commands, despite the bridge's best efforts, still made it into the module, and the lower-ranking technomats complied — by raising the temperature inside the ordnance depot! The heat is about to hit critical levels, and the shells are going to explode, blowing the arsenal and the neighbouring modules to smithereens.

Currently, the most frightening situation on the ship is in the arsenal. Some of the distorted commands, despite the bridge's best efforts, still made it into the compartment, and the lower-ranking technomats complied — by raising the temperature inside the ordnance depot! The heat is about to hit critical levels, and the shells are going to explode, blowing the arsenal and the neighbouring compartments to smithereens.

languages.text: El problema más acuciante de la nave está ahora en la armería. A pesar de los esfuerzos de la tripulación del puente, algunas órdenes distorsionadas han llegado al compartimento y los tecnómatas de menor rango las han obedecido: ¡la temperatura de la santabárbara está aumentando! El calor se está acercando a niveles críticos y la munición está a punto de explotar, lo que destruirá tanto la armería como los compartimentos cercanos.
languages.original_text: Currently, the most frightening situation on the ship is in the arsenal. Some of the distorted commands, despite the bridge's best efforts, still made it into the compartment, and the lower-ranking technomats complied — by raising the temperature inside the ordnance depot! The heat is about to hit critical levels, and the shells are going to explode, blowing the arsenal and the neighbouring compartments to smithereens.

traits.locale_text: El problema más acuciante de la nave está ahora en la armería. A pesar de los esfuerzos de la tripulación del puente, algunas órdenes distorsionadas han llegado al módulo y los tecnómatas de menor rango las han obedecido: ¡la temperatura de la santabárbara está aumentando! El calor se está acercando a niveles críticos y la munición está a punto de explotar, lo que destruirá tanto la armería como los módulos cercanos.

languages.text: 目前舰船上最危急的地方是军械库。尽管舰桥那边已经尽了最大努力，但一部分被篡改的命令还是传到了军械库那边，而那些低阶技工也忠实地执行了命令，提高了弹药库的温度！温度即将到达临界水平，炮弹即将爆炸，军械库与周围邻近区域即将被炸成碎片。
languages.original_text: Currently, the most frightening situation on the ship is in the arsenal. Some of the distorted commands, despite the bridge's best efforts, still made it into the compartment, and the lower-ranking technomats complied — by raising the temperature inside the ordnance depot! The heat is about to hit critical levels, and the shells are going to explode, blowing the arsenal and the neighbouring compartments to smithereens.

traits.locale_text: 目前舰船上最危急的地方是军械库。尽管舰桥那边已经尽了最大努力，但一部分被篡改的命令还是传到了军械库那边，而那些低阶机械殉道者也忠实地执行了命令，提高了弹药库的温度！温度即将到达临界水平，炮弹即将爆炸，军械库与周围邻近区域即将被炸成碎片。

languages.text: 今の所、船内で一番恐ろしい状況にあるのは武器庫の中だ。ブリッジがあれほど尽力したにも関わらず、歪んだコマンドの一部が区画の中に侵入していた。下位のテクノマットがそれに従い、武器庫内の温度を上昇させる。暑さは間もなく限界レベルに達する。そうなると砲弾が爆発し、武器庫と隣接する区画が粉々に吹き飛ばされてしまうだろう。
languages.original_text: Currently, the most frightening situation on the ship is in the arsenal. Some of the distorted commands, despite the bridge's best efforts, still made it into the compartment, and the lower-ranking technomats complied — by raising the temperature inside the ordnance depot! The heat is about to hit critical levels, and the shells are going to explode, blowing the arsenal and the neighbouring compartments to smithereens.

traits.locale_text: 今の所、船内で一番恐ろしい状況にあるのは武器庫の中だ。ブリッジがあれほど尽力したにも関わらず、歪んだコマンドの一部が区画の中に侵入していた。下位のテクノマットがそれに従い、武器庫内の温度を上昇させる。暑さは間もなく限界レベルに達する。そうなると砲弾が爆発し、武器庫と隣接する区画が粉々に吹き飛ばされてしまうだろう。

languages.text: Derzeit ist die Lage auf dem Schiff im Arsenal besonders kritisch. Einige der verzerrten Befehle sind trotz der Anstrengungen der Brücke in die Abteilung gelangt, und die Technomaten der unteren Ränge haben sie befolgt – und die Temperatur im Munitionsdepot erhöht! Die Wärme erreicht in Kürze kritische Werte. Irgendwann werden die Granaten explodieren und das Arsenal und die benachbarten Abteilungen in Stücke reißen.
languages.original_text: Currently, the most frightening situation on the ship is in the arsenal. Some of the distorted commands, despite the bridge's best efforts, still made it into the compartment, and the lower-ranking technomats complied — by raising the temperature inside the ordnance depot! The heat is about to hit critical levels, and the shells are going to explode, blowing the arsenal and the neighbouring compartments to smithereens.

languages.text: C'est l'arsenal qui connaît actuellement la situation la plus alarmante. Malgré les efforts déployés sur la passerelle, certains des ordres altérés sont parvenus au compartiment et les technomates de bas rang les ont exécutés... en augmentant la température du dépôt de munitions ! La chaleur est sur le point d'atteindre un niveau critique qui entraînera l'explosion des obus, dévastant l'arsenal et les compartiments voisins.
languages.original_text: Currently, the most frightening situation on the ship is in the arsenal. Some of the distorted commands, despite the bridge's best efforts, still made it into the compartment, and the lower-ranking technomats complied — by raising the temperature inside the ordnance depot! The heat is about to hit critical levels, and the shells are going to explode, blowing the arsenal and the neighbouring compartments to smithereens.

traits.locale_text: C'est l'arsenal qui connaît actuellement la situation la plus alarmante. Malgré les efforts du pont, certains des ordres altérés sont parvenus au module et les technomates de bas rang les ont exécutés... en augmentant la température du dépôt de munitions ! La chaleur est sur le point d'atteindre un niveau critique qui entraînera l'explosion des obus, dévastant l'arsenal et les modules voisins.

languages.text: Şu anda gemideki en korkutucu durum cephanelikte. Çarpık komutlardan bazıları, köprüdeki tüm çabalara rağmen kompartımana ulaşmış. Düşük rütbeli teknomatlar da mühimmat deposunun içindeki sıcaklığı yükselterek emre uymuş! Isı kritik seviyelere ulaşmak üzere, mermiler patlayarak cephaneliği ve komşu kompartımanları tuzla buz edecek.
languages.original_text: Currently, the most frightening situation on the ship is in the arsenal. Some of the distorted commands, despite the bridge's best efforts, still made it into the compartment, and the lower-ranking technomats complied — by raising the temperature inside the ordnance depot! The heat is about to hit critical levels, and the shells are going to explode, blowing the arsenal and the neighbouring compartments to smithereens.

traits.locale_text: Şu anda gemideki en korkutucu durum cephanelikte. Çarpık komutlardan bazıları, köprüdeki tüm çabalara rağmen kompartımana ulaşmış ve düşük rütbeli teknomatonlar, mühimmat deposunun içindeki sıcaklığı yükselterek emre uymuş! Isı kritik seviyelere ulaşmak üzere, mermiler patlayarak cephaneliği ve komşu kompartımanları tuzla buz edecek.
